```{=html}
<script>
const gallery = document.getElementById('gallery');
const cards = Array.from(gallery.querySelectorAll('.pdf-card'));

// On scroll, find the card closest to the center
function updateActiveCard() {
  const galleryRect = gallery.getBoundingClientRect();
  const centerX = galleryRect.left + galleryRect.width / 2;
  let closest = null;
  let minDist = Infinity;
  cards.forEach(card => {
    const rect = card.getBoundingClientRect();
    const cardCenter = rect.left + rect.width / 2;
    const dist = Math.abs(centerX - cardCenter);
    if(dist < minDist) {
      minDist = dist;
      closest = card;
    }
    card.classList.remove('active');
  });
  if(closest) closest.classList.add('active');
}

// Initial call and attach scroll listener
updateActiveCard();
gallery.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
  requestAnimationFrame(updateActiveCard);
});

// Optional: mouse wheel scroll horizontally
gallery.addEventListener('wheel', e => {
  e.preventDefault();
  gallery.scrollBy({ left: e.deltaY, behavior: 'smooth' });
});
</script>
```
